ProductInfo.Features:
Professional 4 Channel H.264 HDMI DVR with 2 x 1/3" SONY CCD Cameras, 520 TV Lines, 3.6mm Lens and 2 x 1/3" SONY CCD Outdoor or Indoor Camera, 600 TV lines, 24PCS infrared LED, 65.6 feet IR Distance. Free HDMI Male - Male Cable. iPhone, Android Viewing. Windows Graphical interface; embedded real-time Linux 2.6 operation system. Preview, record, playback, backup, network surveillance. USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
4 Channel H.264 video compression format; support D1 resolution     HDMI output for better resolution     ADPCM audio compression format     Windows Graphical interface; embedded real-time Linux 2.6 operation system     PTZ Control     Multiple operation modes (Preview, record, playback, backup, network surveillance and Mobile monitoring)     The video package time is adjustable     USB2.0 backup, upgrade and mouse operation     Multiple language OSD
GW531L: 1/3" SONY CCD Outdoor or Indoor Camera, 600 TV lines, 24PCS infrared LED, 65.6 feet IR Distance, 0.01 Lux/F1.2 Minimum Illumination. Metal vandal proof & water proof      Metal vandal proof & water proof     600 TV lines     24PCS infrared LED     0.01 Lux/F1.2 Minimum Illumination     Automatic tracking white balance
Package Includes:      GW9104V-H DVR with 1T HDD     GWZG10 - Free 3 feet 1.4V HDMI Male - Male Cable     2 x GW630A -1/3" SONY CCD Camera     2 x GW531L -1/3" SONY CCD Camera     1 x GW100CAW: 100 feet pre-made cable BNC     2 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC     1 x GW25CAW: 25 feet pre-made cable BNC     1 x GW12V2A: 12V2A Power Supply for Security Cameras     1 x GW124CA: 1 to 4 Power Splitter Adapter Cables
GW630A: IR Waterproof Outdoor Camera that can be used in a variety of CCTV applications. High Performance and Outstanding Quality. 1/3" SONY CCD, 520 TV Lines.       Excellent High-Res. technology 520 TV lines of Horizontal resolution     New housing design     Auto Gain Control (AGC): Build-in auto gain control (AGC) circuit. The color camera can get high definition picture in low Lux condition     Auto Electronic Shutter (AES): Built-in auto electronic shutter function. The color camera's AES speed can reach 1/100,000s     Gama Characteristic:0.45     Night-time Vision: 0 Lux with IR LED on. Adopt TaiWan high quality IR LED, having very good night-vision effect
